How to ...

Use a torrent Create a torrent Download a torrent

Step 1

To use a torrent file on you must have a BitTorrent application. BitTorrent itself and other torrent supported applications are available on Android iOS Windows Mac Linux. You can download your copy of BitTorrent here

Step 2

Install the BitTorrent client. Once the client is succesfully installed you're ready to open any .torrent file or magnet url.


Wasn't expecting it would be so easy ?

Step 1

To create a torrent you must have a torrent client on system.

Step 2

File > Create Torrent

Step 3

Select directories you want to upload.

Step 4

Add Trackers. Remember this an important part trackers keep the records of sawrm hosts. You can get tracker list from here.

Step 5

Save the torrent and send it to your freinds. Remember do not tick private torrent unless you're using any private tracker

It's upto you

Torrents can be downloaded from anywhere cloud,ftp,email,wifi transfer etc. But here is the list of few legal torrent downloading site.Here you can share yours too
